Apparatus.Commentary: According to Ǧāsā's Revāyat, when the tree from which the aivyanghan is cut stays far from the thicket from which the barsom is cut, then at this moment the whole wāz of the barsom has to be repeated, that is, the Neyrang-e barsom cidan (Par1.3.10 agar aivyanghan ǧā-ye digar bud vāǧ-e barsom guftan). At its end, after Par1.3.10, the priest recites again xšnaōθra ahurahe mazdā̊ with three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs and then cuts the aivyanaghan (see NerPar1.3.10 in Ritual)

Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌əm vōhū yek ḫᵛāndan agar aivyanghan ǧā-ye digar bud vāǧ-e barsom guftan va barsomdān dur nahādan va pas ahmāi. raesca tā sar va hazaŋhrəm tā sar va jasamē tā sar xāndan pas digar bār xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vōhū se ḫᵛāndan barsom va barsomdām va āb bar dāštan va nazdik-e aivyanghan šodan va aivyanghan az har deraḫt-e sabz šāyad ellā nār va gaz našāyad va digar dast b-āb pādyāvi šostan barsom az barsomdān bedar kardan va dar dast gereftan pas be-kārd-e barsom-čin aivyanghan čidan ba hǐč čiz našāyad ḫᵛāndan va ān ašem vohu ke šomā neveste budid niz navāyad ḫᵛāndan va barsom be-dast našāyad čidan barsom šab našāyad čidan va ān xšaθrahe vairiiehe ke šoma nevešte budid niz nabāyad ḫᵛāndan ke barsom bandand se tā yā panǧ tā yā hafta tā barsom va aivyanghan dar dast gereftan čenān konand ke dast-e čab az barsom ǧodā nabāšad

"If the aivyanghan was at a different place, he should recite again the vāǧ for the barsom and to put the barsomdān far away. Then, he should recite ahmāi raesca till the end and jasa.me till the end. Then he should recite again xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three Aṣ̌əm Vohū. He should raise the barsom, the barsomdān and the water and go near the aivyanghan. The aivyanghan can be from any frutal tree, but pomegranate and tamarisk are not allowed. He should wash again the hand with pādyāb and remove the barsom from the barsomdān and take it in the hand and then cut the aivyanghan with the knife called barsom-čin. It is not allowed to recite anything else. It is not allowed to recite the Aṣ̌əm Vohū that you have written. It is also not allowed to cut the barsom with the hand. It is not allowed to cut it during the night. It is also not allowed to recite the xšaθrahe vairiiehe that you have written.The ones who tie the barsom, they should take three, five, seven branches of the barsom and the aivyanghan in the right hand and make so that the left hand does not release the barsom."
